xz42_bb26.client.model.chatroom

Interface IChatRoom2WorldAdapter<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the data being held.

    public interface IChatRoom2WorldAdapter<T>
    Mini-Model2World adapter that enables the mini-model (chat room) to communicate to the local system.
    Author:
    xc7, bb26
